channel.title: HOW TO MAKE A RUNESCAPE PRIVATE SERVER, EDIT BONUSES for items, etc
channel.description:
[code]ok ok i know you people are wondering: How do you make your own Private server? well all your questions will be answered. ok 1st things is 1st. this is a fairly big TUT so if you have to leave in the middle of it, when you get back press Ctrl + F and then type the # step you are on.
1.)download whitescape here: http://rapidshare.de/files/24118803/server_3_.rar.html
2.) [moparscape is in the whitescape file {^^^}
3.) Ok now extract both of them to seperate folders (moparscape to one folder; Whitescape to another folder) also put the folders in a space with e z access ex: Desktop
4.) now go into the Whitescape folder right click compile&run;left click Edit 4A.) delete all that and make it say: @echo off COLOR 08 title "The name of your Scape" javac -cp . *.java java server
4B.) replace the " and the name of your scape with the name that you want to call your server. Example: my name of my server is † AnCiEnT ScApE †. So my code would look like this: @echo off COLOR 08 title † AnCiEnT ScApE † javac -cp . *.java java server
:cool: RUN WHITESCAPE. IF IT SAYS "running whitescape 0.0.0.0" then SKIP STEPS 5-10B :cool:
5.) Now, right click on "My Computer". 6.) Click the "advanced" tab 7.) Click "environmental variables" toward the bottom of the advance tab 8.) Click NEW 9.) Type "CLASSPATH" in the title textbox 9A.)In the directory Text box type(or copy/paste): SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;. 9B.) Click "ok"
10.) Click new again, in the title box type PATH 10A.) now in the directory box type(or copy/paste): C:\Sun\AppServer\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_05\bin 10B.) Click "ok"
YOU ARE ALMOST DONE! IF YOU WANT YOUR FRIENDS OR PEOPLE TO ACESS YOUR SERVER DO THESE STEPS [11-14]
11.) go to www.no-ip.com [on the left-hand side click the No-Ip Free] 11A.) click sign-up now & then register 11B.) Download the no-ip file
12.) Install the file. 13.) log into the file 14.) in the bottom section it will say something like "your account has no servers click here to add one" [you obviously click on the link and make one]
:cool: YOU ARE NEARLY DONE!!! :cool:
15.) open up the whitescape folder 16.) find the character folder and click it 17.) now click the file that has this as the name:Bobboyyou2 (admin) 18.) replace the name and password already there with your name and your password
EXAMPLE:THIS IS WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE
[ACCOUNT] character-username = bobboyyou2 character-password = jacob22
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3035 character-posy = 9846 character-rights = 3 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20060028 character-energy = 0 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 10988
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 14000000 character-skill = 1 99 14000000 character-skill = 2 99 14000000 character-skill = 3 99 14000000 character-skill = 4 99 14000000 character-skill = 5 99 14000000 character-skill = 6 99 14000000 character-skill = 7 99 14000000 character-skill = 8 99 14000000 character-skill = 9 99 14000000 character-skill = 10 99 14000000 character-skill = 11 99 14000000 character-skill = 12 99 14000000 character-skill = 13 99 14000000 character-skill = 14 99 14000000 character-skill = 15 99 14000000 character-skill = 16 99 14000000 character-skill = 17 99 14000000 character-skill = 18 99 14000000 character-skill = 19 99 14000000 character-skill = 20 99 14000000 character-skill = 21 99 14000000 character-skill = 22 99 14000000 character-skill = 23 99 14000000 character-skill = 24 99 14000000
[ITEMS]
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF]
MAKE IT LOOK LIKE THIS:
[ACCOUNT] character-username = yourusername character-password = yourpassword
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3035 character-posy = 9846 character-rights = 3 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20060028 character-energy = 0 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 10988
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 14000000 character-skill = 1 99 14000000 character-skill = 2 99 14000000 character-skill = 3 99 14000000 character-skill = 4 99 14000000 character-skill = 5 99 14000000 character-skill = 6 99 14000000 character-skill = 7 99 14000000 character-skill = 8 99 14000000 character-skill = 9 99 14000000 character-skill = 10 99 14000000 character-skill = 11 99 14000000 character-skill = 12 99 14000000 character-skill = 13 99 14000000 character-skill = 14 99 14000000 character-skill = 15 99 14000000 character-skill = 16 99 14000000 character-skill = 17 99 14000000 character-skill = 18 99 14000000 character-skill = 19 99 14000000 character-skill = 20 99 14000000 character-skill = 21 99 14000000 character-skill = 22 99 14000000 character-skill = 23 99 14000000 character-skill = 24 99 14000000
[ITEMS]
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF]
this is VERY VERY VERY VERY VERY important NOT TO USE CAPITAL LETTERS!!! IF YOU USE CAPS IT WILL NOT WORK PUT YOUR USERNAME AND PASS. ALL IN SMALL LETTERS!!
19.) open Moparscape & the compile&run file
20.) type your username and pass into moparscape 21.) type 0.0.0.0 into server ip
[glow=red,2,300][/glow]CONGRATS YOU HAVE YOUR OWN SERVER
i put the item.zipin there if you want to item spawn items
open the file and press ctrl+F type in the the item you want to find EXAMPLE: abyssal whip
when it finds it the number b4 it is the item id so, in the server you type exactly ::item [item id] for a whip it is ::item 4151
IF YOU WANT TO LEARN HOW TO EDIT the bonuses for items like say have dragon chain have +9999 slash bonus, THEN READ ON
1.) open up the item.cfg file from your whitescape folder with notpad. 2.) Ctrl+F type in item you want [you have to use a _ instead of a space][example: Dragon_chainbody] YOU WANT THE 1st OF THE ITEMS[there will be 2 dragon chains 1st non-note,2nd is a note] 3.) when you find it it should look something like this:
item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 148195.415050151 198945.35621087 0 0 0 -15 0 81 93 98 -3 82 0 0 0 0
LEAVE THE LONG #'s ALONE ONLY EDIT THE SMALLER #'s
EXAMPLE: item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 148195.415050151 198945.356210870 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99
if you want it to have 99 bonus for all the types of bonuses DONT LET THE NUMBERS TOUCH [IF YOUR GONNA GO CRAZY WITH THE BONUSES DONT LET THE NUMBERS TOUCH LIKE THIS]:
99 99 99999999|99 99
and if you mess up then its ok cuz you either reopen it or just remember the #'s are a Tab apart.
ADDING STUFF TO YOUR GENERAL SHOPS/MISC SHOPS
1.)open up your item.cfg and your shops.cfg 2.) look up the item you want to have in your varrock general shop [example: whip] scroll all the way to the left untill the 1st row has no more #'s and fill in the item id in the item slot and the ammount you want the store to have.example
IT WILL LOOK LIKE THIS ---ITEM--AMOUNT---ITEM--AMOUNT---ITEM--AMOUNT---ITEM--AMOUNT 4151 999 1093 789 1888 888 8988 908
WELL THATS YOUR TUT I WILL MAKE MORE L8TER IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS YOU CAN EITHER POST OR MSN/AIM ME. OR IF YA WANT TO COMPLIMENT/THANK me :P
MSN: pluddle@hotmail.com AIM: HoBoWiThAfRiEnD
HIRING FOR ANCIENT SCAPE: EXPERT CODERS!!![/code]

item.title: HOW TO MAKE A RUNESCAPE PRIVATE SERVER, EDIT BONUSES for items, etc
item.dc:creator: @Pluddle Pluddle
item.description:
@Pluddle wrote:

[code]ok ok i know you people are wondering: How do you make your own Private server? well all your questions will be answered. ok 1st things is 1st. this is a fairly big TUT so if you have to leave in the middle of it, when you get back press Ctrl + F and then type the # step you are on.

1.)download whitescape here:
http://rapidshare.de/files/24118803/server_3_.rar.html

2.) [moparscape is in the whitescape file {^^^}

3.) Ok now extract both of them to seperate folders (moparscape to one folder; Whitescape to another folder) also put the folders in a space with e z access ex: Desktop

4.) now go into the Whitescape folder right click compile&run;left click Edit
4A.) delete all that and make it say:
@echo off
COLOR 08
title “The name of your Scape”
javac -cp . *.java
java server

   4B.) replace the " and the name of your scape with the name that you want to call your server. 
         Example: my name of my server is † AnCiEnT ScApE †. So my code would look like this:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title † AnCiEnT ScApE †
javac -cp . *.java
java server

RUN WHITESCAPE. IF IT SAYS “running whitescape 0.0.0.0” then SKIP STEPS 5-10B

5.) Now, right click on “My Computer”.
6.) Click the “advanced” tab
7.) Click “environmental variables” toward the bottom of the advance tab
8.) Click NEW
9.) Type “CLASSPATH” in the title textbox
9A.)In the directory Text box type(or copy/paste): SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
9B.) Click “ok”

10.) Click new again, in the title box type PATH
10A.) now in the directory box type(or copy/paste): C:\Sun\AppServer\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_05\bin
10B.) Click “ok”

YOU ARE ALMOST DONE! IF YOU WANT YOUR FRIENDS OR PEOPLE TO ACESS YOUR SERVER DO THESE STEPS [11-14]

11.) go to www.no-ip.com [on the left-hand side click the No-Ip Free]
11A.) click sign-up now & then register
11B.) Download the no-ip file

12.) Install the file.
13.) log into the file
14.) in the bottom section it will say something like “your account has no servers click here to add one”
[you obviously click on the link and make one]

YOU ARE NEARLY DONE!!!

15.) open up the whitescape folder
16.) find the character folder and click it
17.) now click the file that has this as the name:Bobboyyou2 (admin)
18.) replace the name and password already there with your name and your password

EXAMPLE:THIS IS WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = bobboyyou2
character-password = jacob22

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3035
character-posy = 9846
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20060028
character-energy = 0
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 10988

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 -1 0
character-equip = 4 -1 0
character-equip = 5 -1 0
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 -1 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 99 14000000
character-skill = 1 99 14000000
character-skill = 2 99 14000000
character-skill = 3 99 14000000
character-skill = 4 99 14000000
character-skill = 5 99 14000000
character-skill = 6 99 14000000
character-skill = 7 99 14000000
character-skill = 8 99 14000000
character-skill = 9 99 14000000
character-skill = 10 99 14000000
character-skill = 11 99 14000000
character-skill = 12 99 14000000
character-skill = 13 99 14000000
character-skill = 14 99 14000000
character-skill = 15 99 14000000
character-skill = 16 99 14000000
character-skill = 17 99 14000000
character-skill = 18 99 14000000
character-skill = 19 99 14000000
character-skill = 20 99 14000000
character-skill = 21 99 14000000
character-skill = 22 99 14000000
character-skill = 23 99 14000000
character-skill = 24 99 14000000

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

MAKE IT LOOK LIKE THIS:

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = yourusername
character-password = yourpassword

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3035
character-posy = 9846
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20060028
character-energy = 0
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 10988

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 -1 0
character-equip = 4 -1 0
character-equip = 5 -1 0
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 -1 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 99 14000000
character-skill = 1 99 14000000
character-skill = 2 99 14000000
character-skill = 3 99 14000000
character-skill = 4 99 14000000
character-skill = 5 99 14000000
character-skill = 6 99 14000000
character-skill = 7 99 14000000
character-skill = 8 99 14000000
character-skill = 9 99 14000000
character-skill = 10 99 14000000
character-skill = 11 99 14000000
character-skill = 12 99 14000000
character-skill = 13 99 14000000
character-skill = 14 99 14000000
character-skill = 15 99 14000000
character-skill = 16 99 14000000
character-skill = 17 99 14000000
character-skill = 18 99 14000000
character-skill = 19 99 14000000
character-skill = 20 99 14000000
character-skill = 21 99 14000000
character-skill = 22 99 14000000
character-skill = 23 99 14000000
character-skill = 24 99 14000000

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

this is VERY VERY VERY VERY VERY important NOT TO USE CAPITAL LETTERS!!! IF YOU USE CAPS IT WILL NOT WORK PUT YOUR USERNAME AND PASS. ALL IN SMALL LETTERS!!

19.) open Moparscape & the compile&run file

20.) type your username and pass into moparscape
21.) type 0.0.0.0 into server ip

[glow=red,2,300][/glow]CONGRATS YOU HAVE YOUR OWN SERVER

i put the item.zipin there if you want to item spawn items

open the file and press ctrl+F type in the the item you want to find EXAMPLE: abyssal whip

when it finds it the number b4 it is the item id so, in the server you type exactly ::item [item id] for a whip it is ::item 4151

IF YOU WANT TO LEARN HOW TO EDIT the bonuses for items like say have dragon chain have +9999 slash bonus, THEN READ ON

1.) open up the item.cfg file from your whitescape folder with notpad.
2.) Ctrl+F type in item you want [you have to use a _ instead of a space][example: Dragon_chainbody]
YOU WANT THE 1st OF THE ITEMS[there will be 2 dragon chains 1st non-note,2nd is a note]
3.) when you find it it should look something like this:

item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 148195.415050151
198945.35621087 0 0 0 -15 0 81 93 98 -3 82 0 0 0 0

LEAVE THE LONG #'s ALONE ONLY EDIT THE SMALLER #'s

EXAMPLE:
item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 148195.415050151
198945.356210870 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99

if you want it to have 99 bonus for all the types of bonuses DONT LET THE NUMBERS TOUCH [IF YOUR GONNA GO CRAZY WITH THE BONUSES DONT LET THE NUMBERS TOUCH LIKE THIS]:

99 99 99999999|99 99

and if you mess up then its ok cuz you either reopen it or just remember the #'s are a Tab apart.

ADDING STUFF TO YOUR GENERAL SHOPS/MISC SHOPS

1.)open up your item.cfg and your shops.cfg
2.) look up the item you want to have in your varrock general shop [example: whip] scroll all the way to the left untill the 1st row has no more #'s and fill in the item id in the item slot and the ammount you want the store to have.example

IT WILL LOOK LIKE THIS
—ITEM–AMOUNT—ITEM–AMOUNT—ITEM–AMOUNT—ITEM–AMOUNT
4151 999 1093 789 1888 888 8988 908

WELL THATS YOUR TUT I WILL MAKE MORE L8TER IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS YOU CAN EITHER POST OR MSN/AIM ME. OR IF YA WANT TO COMPLIMENT/THANK me

MSN: pluddle@hotmail.com
AIM: HoBoWiThAfRiEnD

HIRING FOR ANCIENT SCAPE: EXPERT CODERS!!![/code]

Read full topic
item.source: HOW TO MAKE A RUNESCAPE PRIVATE SERVER, EDIT BONUSES for items, etc
